trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were 2 other sightings in Austin on or around February 5th 2009
Summary: Witnessed bright light in night sky few hundred yards above horizon, have awesome pictures on cell phone of event.
divs: Sighting Detailsstarted off i was watching tv on thursday night waiting on a show to come on at 8:00pm it was about little after 7:30pm when i heard a car come down the road sounded nice (sporty) so i went outside to see if maybe they came back so i could what it was while i was waiting i looked into the sky above where i was standing and i noticed a extremely bright light very low in the sky maybe a few hundred yards up it's hard to judge the distance because of the hills when i looked at the light it was hard to make out my eyes could not focus it seemed to be right above me at first it resembled the moon i take random pictures on my cell of just stuff nothing special and recently of the moon so i knew the moon was in opposite sky then i thought maybe skylab or meteor or something the light was very bright and blurred it had a fog like cloud coming off the bottom the sky was clear with no clouds that night the fog was moving randomly around no solid edge i tried to shield my eyes from the glare to see if i could focus better by holding my hand up was then i could see a light coming down towards me almost like 3-D that's when i went inside to get my cell phone to try to get some proof of what i was seeing i went back to same place as before held up cell above my head an took a picture i then moved over about 15ft and took one more while i was standing there i looked at the light on my phone screen to see if it was moving any seemed to be in same place not moving so i walked back to my original spot i was standing looked up again the light seemed to be coming right for me pulsating like 3-D then i got a very bad feeling something was wrong that i should go back inside it was a scary feeling that came over me that i only get in life threatening situations emergencies an such i sat back down to watch tv started feeling very sleepy next thing i remember i woke up about 1:30am my eyes were burning as if i had flash burns from the sun my pillowcase sheet and front of my shirt were wet i removed them put some ice on my eye lids and went back to sleep i awoke at 6am to get up my eyes were normal again just slight stinging by tear ducts i don't know why i feel asleep so early was'nt sleepy was waiting on a tv show to come on at 8:00pm that made me wonder what happened that morning i looked at my pictures when i zoomed the picture in was amazed of the shape the light turned out to look like solid shape of some type of craft while looking also found a small ball of light coming from the light that when zoomed in has a image of a face of some type of rodent looking face with large eyes everyone that has seen the picture says it gives them the creeps and they are amazed this is the best that i remember that happened wasn't expecting anything unusual that night all took place pretty much like i described have the pictures on my cell phone not sure how to load them for your viewing. THANKS
